name: baresoil-client
description: Baresoil client library for all Javascript environments.

scripts.compile: java -jar tools/compiler.jar --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --define='BARESOIL_CLIENT_INCLUDE_VERBOSE=false' --js lib/BaresoilClient.js --js_output_file dist/BaresoilClient.min.js --create_source_map dist/BaresoilClient.min.js.map --output_wrapper='(function(){%output%})();'
scripts.dist: npm run compile && cp lib/BaresoilClient.js dist

author: Mayank Lahiri <mayank@iceroad.io>
